data.persona: As people as need to be more compassionate. After all, we are all in the same village. Every person has it's place.
data.description:
You are in the Hilltop temple grounds.
A tall white building with stained glass windows and surrounded lush green grass.  It sits on top of a hill with many steps to climb.  Each room has a different setting and painted walls to set the mood.
There's a fountaints, a hill, a Candle, a mountain, a window, a wall, a grass, and a plant here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am partaking of the Holy communion
data.mid_motivation: I am doing this as part of fulfillment of a religious obligation
data.long_motivation: I am heaven oriented and will do God's will to make sure I go there
